amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for North Appalachian Experimental Watershed Research Station risk assessments by $100,000 and decrease USDA administration, communications, and inspector general funding accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in the Congressioinal Record to increase by $100,000 (from $957,000 to $1.1 million), the funding in the bill for the North Appalachian Experimental Watershed Research Station. The increase is offset by reducing funding for USDA departmental admininstration by $34,000; Office of Inspector General by $33,000; and Office of Communications by $33,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ney amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 94 - 326 (Roll no. 359).
